name: Richard E. STROTHER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Strother v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of April, 2007, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

919 A.2d 228
Richard E. STROTHER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
